messages.message: Hi, do we have a site admin API for AI Hub that allows me to list all customer accounts and their users?
there is an admin account yes; do you need an API or just a UI screenshot for all customer users?
i can help giving you all customer accounts if you provide the customer email handle
Thanks Kerry, i’m looking for an API so that I can build something which will help us to manage customers and the actions we have for helping them.
And example could be being able to pull account data into Salesforce

I see, then @Heymian can you help here?

Short answer is that the API is available; need to get you access, and also validate how we query over a company (think we can use their org).
Hey @Lee I think this existing API should do the trick: https://instabase.com/docs/apis/organization/index.html#list-all-organizations
Thanks @Heymian, so each customer account on AI Hub is an organisation space?
How do I get a site admin API key to be able to get that info for all orgs?
We wouldn’t make you a site admin. If you give me which username you want to use, we  just make you `A user with the manage organizations site ACL` .

ah got it thanks. I think for now I can I can get started in preprod while i’m getting setup. Could I get the ACL added for <mailto:lee.spacagna+aihubgtm@instabase.com|lee.spacagna+aihubgtm@instabase.com> please (in preprod)?
